#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,k,o,i,j;
    char c;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    for(o=0;o<t;o++)
    {
        scanf("%d",&k);
        if(k<=25)
        {
            c=97+k;
            while(c!=96)
            {
                cout<<c;
                c--;
            }  
            j=0;  
        }
        else if(k<=50)
        {
            c=97+k-25;
            while(c!=96)
            {
                cout<<c;
                c--;
            }
            j=1;
        }
        else if(k<=75)
        {
            c=97+k-50;
            while(c!=96)
            {
                cout<<c;
                c--;
            }
            j=2;
        }
        else
        {
            c=97+k-75;
            while(c!=96)
            {
                cout<<c;
                c--;
            }
            j=3;
        }       
        for(i=0;i<j;i++)
        {
            c='z';
            while(c!=96)
            {
                cout<<c;
                c--;
            }
        }
        printf("\n");
    }    
    system("pause");
    return 0;
}
